summary:
Yeah, yeah, I know - yet ANOTHER standard, boring old follower mod.
Nothing really new or innovative here.

Enjoy only if you want to.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/434/32380130262_8ee0e55942_o.png[/img]

[font=Verdana][size=4][b]!! NEXUS [color=#ff00ff]EXCLUSIVE[/color] RELEASE !!

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/524/32509888905_b318c34fb4_b.jpg[/img]

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/260/31698271523_d68dbb891b_b.jpg[/img]
[youtube]YQ0eeZ8v7tk[/youtube]

CHEERS TO RIPX FOR THIS REVIEW
[/b][/size][/font]
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8062/29376931440_aef9e38d1b_o.png[/img][/center]
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/705/32153562630_4516fa9872_o.png[/img]

[font=Verdana]Here is my second Standalone Follower that I've made. Her name is Samantha and she is a Model for [b][i]Tamriel Undergarments for Ladies[/i][/b], hence why you'll find her wearing lingerie. Apart from modelling, Samantha is a highly skilled Witch in Destruction Magic and levels with the player, so you shouldn't have to worry about her getting hurt during your adventures! You'll find her finishing off a photo-shoot in the [b][color=#ff00ff]ELDERGLEAM SANCTUARY[/color][/b].

Samantha is [b][color=#ff00ff]MARRIAGEABLE[/color][/b] and [b][color=#ff00ff]ESSENTIAL[/color],[/b] so you are able to go nuts with her! 


[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/411/32357720582_56f2182d50_b.jpg[/img][/center][/font]

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/515/32491645016_cf067943de_o.png[/img]

[font=Verdana]As with my last follower, Samantha is [b][color=#ff00ff]COMPLETELY STANDALONE[/color][/b], meaning that no other mods are required! But anyway, here are a couple of mods that I recommend you use:[quote][color=#ff00ff][b]AESTHETICS:[/b][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]
[color=#ead1dc]Snapdragon Prime ENB[/color][/url][color=#ead1dc] [/color][color=#ffffff]- By tetrodoxin[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?][color=#ead1dc]Face Light[/color][/url] [color=#ffffff]- By tktk1[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44596/?][color=#ead1dc]MFG Console[/color][/url][color=#ffffff] - By kapaer[/color]

[color=#ff00ff][b]ARMOR:
[/b][/color][color=#ead1dc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25389/?][color=#ead1dc]Sweet and Sexy Lingerie Shop[/color][/url] [/color][color=#ffffff]- By Nikitaa[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?][color=#ead1dc]KS Jewelry[/color][/url] [color=#ffffff]- By Kalilies and Stealhtic Khaos[/color][/quote]If you like Samantha be sure to check out my other Standalone Follower, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78931/?][color=#ead1dc]Heather[/color][/url]![/font]

[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/421/32387860801_338a8945c8_b.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/609/32532561965_03730b1823_o.png[/img]

This mod can be installed with NMM or whatever program you use, but personally I prefer to install small mods like this manually.

[quote][font=Verdana][color=#ffffff]1. Extract the .7zip archive to a location of your choice.
2. Drag the Data folder to where your Skyrim directory is located.
3. Make sure that NMD - Samantha Standalone.esp is activated in the Skyrim launcher.
4. Done![/color][/font][/quote][font=Verdana]If you missed it, I'll state it again.
[b][color=#ff00ff]LOCATION[/color] :[/b] The Eldergleam Sanctuary.[/font]

[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8062/29376931440_aef9e38d1b_o.png[/img][/center]

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/530/32532562055_6c133b9251_o.png[/img]

[font=Verdana]Again, I just want to make a [b][color=#ff00ff]HUGE SHOUTOUT[/color][/b] to[color=#ead1dc] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3970139/?][color=#ead1dc]VRDaphni[/color][/url][/color] for helping me with any issue that I came across. This mod wouldn't be possible without your help :) You are really appreciated!

[quote][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?tb=about&pUp=1]Caliente[/url] [color=#ffffff]for the[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE Body[/url] [color=#ffffff]and[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675/?tb=about&pUp=1]dimon99[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP Female Bod[/url]y
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/245015/?tb=about&pUp=1]Zonzai[/url] [color=#ffffff]for allowing me to modify[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Body Texture
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1674320/?]Maevan2[/url] [color=#ffffff]for allowing me to modify[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7106389/?]SkylaSkyrim[/url] [color=#ffffff]for the Standalone Follower Tutorial[/color]
[url=http://yev.restrictedareagaming.net/]Yevvie[/url] [color=#ffffff]for[/color] [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3148-yevmods-makeup-pack-ymmp-2k-4k/]YMMP Makeup[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Hvergelmer[/url] [color=#ffffff]for[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows
[/url][url=https://etherealmod.wordpress.com/]Nikitaa[/url] [color=#ffffff]for allowing me to modify and use the[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25389/?]Black Leather Corset[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665/?]Kalilies, Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/url] [color=#ffffff]for[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756/?]LogRaam[/url] [color=#ffffff]for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url][/color]
